title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Mark Steyn fills in for Rush and thanks him for his sacrifice and commitment to the EIB Network during these challenging times. Top law firm hired by Trump leaks to the NYT. One week later, Alaska continues counting ballots. Why this election should scare everyone. Callers weigh in on mail-in ballot fraud. What legal case does the GOP have? 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

What relief do you seek from the court regarding this election? Only TV networks have called the election. Criminal prosecutions won’t happen before Electoral College meets in Dec. The more a system moves away from paper ballots, the less secure it is. Why GA will go left with mail-in voting. Democrat swing states decided the election. Steyn weighs in on Rush’s thoughts on the media, especially Fox, and why talk radio will never abandon their audience. Fox paying the price. Callers report anecdotal stories of voter fraud. 

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Steyn explains why Trump won the election and addresses “Stop the Steal” folks. This is not a victimless crime. Caller: 24-year-old Trump voter spells it out. BREXIT and Trump. The Election achieved what the Russian probe couldn’t in removing Trump. Hunter Biden stole from the Ukrainian people. Biggest electoral heist in modern era. Caller upset with Steyn on the NYT lawyer leak story. There are 71 million voters who deserve the truth about what happened, but we need to move with urgency -- an election was stolen in plain sight, folks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
